definitions.text: an isolated fact that is considered separately from the whole
examples: several of the details are similar

definitions.text: a small part that can be considered separately from the whole
examples: it was perfect in all details
the essay contained too much detail

definitions.text: a crew of workers selected for a particular task
examples: a detail was sent to remove the fallen trees
the peacekeeping force includes one British contingent
The ambulances were detailed to the fire station
